function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in physical activity levels during COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of sedentary lifestyle-related health issues, reduced immune system function.","Mitigation":"Promotion of home-based physical activity, provision of online exercise resources, community support.","Technologies":"Fitness tracking apps, virtual fitness classes, remote personal training.","People":"General population, individuals with existing health conditions, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness professionals, government stakeholders."},{"Description":"Increased housework activities leading to unexpected physical activity levels in certain population groups.","Impact":"Potential strain on muscles and joints, increased risk of overexertion or injury.","Mitigation":"Education on safe and effective housework practices, promotion of regular breaks and stretching.","Technologies":"Online tutorials for home maintenance and cleaning, ergonomic household tools.","People":"Population groups with low activity levels, individuals with limited mobility.","Owner":"Health and wellness organizations, occupational health professionals, ergonomic product manufacturers."},{"Description":"Significant decrease in physical activity among different gender and age groups during quarantine.","Impact":"Increased risk of cardiovascular diseases, decreased mental well-being, reduced overall health and fitness.","Mitigation":"Tailored physical activity interventions for different gender and age groups, mental health support services.","Technologies":"AI-powered health monitoring devices, personalized fitness apps, telemedicine for mental health support.","People":"Different gender and age groups, individuals at risk of mental health issues.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, fitness professionals, mental health practitioners."}]}
